title: Noam Chomsky: Can The Political Process Be Saved?
description:
I asked Noam Chomsky what would he recommend for all of those who want to become public servants. His answer: "Acting to advance the prospect that the political system can be improved - - saved is a strong word."

Watch our full interview here:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zTBsRmn0n3g
